channel.title: CVE Feed for Synetics -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synetics -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8750|2024-09-12T11:39:43.396Z -- synetics -- idoit%20pro
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in idoit pro version 28. This vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve session details of an authenticated user due to lack of proper sanitization of the following parameters (id,lang,mNavID,name,pID,treeNode,type,view).

item.title: CVE-2024-8749|2024-09-12T11:36:55.184Z -- synetics -- idoit%20pro
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in idoit pro version 28. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a specially crafted query to the ID parameter in /var/www/html/src/classes/modules/api/model/cmdb/isys_api_model_cmdb_objects_by_relation.class.php and retrieve all the information stored in the database.
